channel.description: Recent content in cookbook on Dipankar's blog

item.title: New book : Nginx web server cookbook
item.description: Guys after a long break, I have come out of my slumber to talk about my first publication with Packt publishing. In short the book is about tips and tricks around the upcoming Nginx web server. You can check it out using this link. This has been published by Packt publishing, a UK based technical publishing house. It would not have been possible without the tremendous support of the people around me, and in specific the many people I have worked with.
